chint.content: Facing cross-border challenges with high-value products, Kenable's one-stop solutions and full-value protection allow us to focus confidently on the US market without worries.
chint.author: Mr. Zhang

cushionLab.content: As a multi-platform seller with over $100 million in annual sales, Kenable leverages its nationwide multi-warehouse network and flexible fulfillment modes to provide stable and efficient warehousing and distribution services.
cushionLab.author: Mr. Li

solutions.title: Kenable Solutions
solutions.description: Integrating transportation, warehousing, customs clearance, and trade compliance to provide one-stop international logistics solutions.

services.question: What are your main services?
services.answer: We provide comprehensive supply chain services including international first-mile logistics, US nationwide delivery (parcels and truck lines), overseas warehousing, return processing (reverse logistics), and value-added services such as sorting and relabeling.

warehouses.question: Where are your warehouses located in the US?
warehouses.answer: We have strategically located self-operated warehouses in California, Texas, Georgia, and Indiana to support efficient nationwide distribution.

timeline.question: How long does it take from China sea freight to US delivery?
timeline.answer: Complete process timeline: Pickup/Customs 1-2 days → International sea freight (Matson express) 12-15 days → Customs clearance 1-3 days → Delivery to LA warehouse 12-36 hours → Receiving and shelving 12-36 hours → Last-mile delivery 2-5 days. Total approximately 20-28 days, with transparent control at every stage.

footer.description: Professional cross-border supply chain solutions provider, committed to providing end-to-end logistics services for global e-commerce enterprises.

warehouses.title: Warehouse Network
warehouses.description: Intelligent warehouse network covering 4 major distribution centers across the US, providing efficient warehousing and distribution services.

hero.title: Strategically Deployed Intelligent Warehouse Network Across the US
hero.description: Kenable has strategically deployed 4 major distribution centers across the United States, covering the East and West coasts as well as the central region, ensuring the fastest and most cost-effective warehousing and distribution services for customers.
hero.detailPart1: Each distribution center is equipped with advanced WMS warehouse management systems, enabling intelligent sorting, automated inventory management, and real-time order tracking, ensuring 99% of packages are picked up within 24 hours.
hero.detailPart2: Total warehouse area exceeds 500,000 square feet with daily processing capacity of 100,000 packages, providing comprehensive professional services from inbound to outbound for cross-border e-commerce customers.

warehouses.centersDescription: Each distribution center is carefully selected to ensure optimal geographic location and operational efficiency

la.name: Los Angeles Distribution Center
la.description: Located near the Port of Los Angeles, this is our largest distribution center serving the West Coast region.

chicago.name: Chicago Distribution Center
chicago.description: Strategically positioned to connect East and West coasts, serving as the logistics hub for the central region.

ny.name: New York Distribution Center
ny.description: Serving the US East Coast and Northeast regions, located near the Port of New York.

dallas.name: Dallas Distribution Center
dallas.description: Newly built modern distribution center using the latest intelligent warehousing technology.

warehouses.wmsDescription: Advanced WMS system enabling full-process automation management
warehouses.processDescription: Standardized operating procedures ensuring precise execution at every stage

reverse.title: Reverse Logistics
reverse.description: Professional reverse logistics solutions designed to transform your return processing from a cost center to a value recovery center, maximizing your product lifecycle value through professional operations. Efficient return processing, fast restocking, overstock inventory management and disposal, product reprocessing.

hero.title: Turning Returns into Resources - Professional Reverse Logistics to Maximize Your Profit Margins
hero.subtitle: Professional reverse logistics solutions designed to transform your return processing from a cost center to a value recovery center, maximizing your product lifecycle value through professional operations. Efficient return processing, fast restocking, overstock inventory management and disposal, product reprocessing.

challenges.title: Core Challenges in Reverse Logistics
challenges.description: Returns are an inevitable part of e-commerce operations, but if not managed properly, they can quickly become a 'black hole' that erodes profits. Complex processing procedures, product value depreciation, and inventory accumulation are common challenges all merchants face in reverse logistics.

inefficiency.title: Low Processing Efficiency
inefficiency.description: Slow return processes lead to delayed customer refunds, affecting customer experience and brand reputation.

valueLoss.title: Product Value Loss
valueLoss.description: Returned products cannot receive timely, professional processing, causing their value to rapidly decline, making them difficult to resell.

stockAccumulation.title: Serious Inventory Accumulation
stockAccumulation.description: Returns and overstocked inventory occupy valuable warehouse space and capital, affecting new product inventory turnover.

dataBlackBox.title: Data Black Box
dataBlackBox.description: Lack of effective data analysis on return reasons and product conditions, making it difficult to optimize products and operations from the source.

solutions.title: Kenable's One-Stop Solution
solutions.description: Kenable's reverse logistics solutions are designed to transform your return processing from a cost center to a value recovery center, maximizing your product lifecycle value through professional operations.

efficientProcessing.title: Efficient Return Processing
efficientProcessing.description: We provide professional return receiving, unpacking, inspection, and sorting services, systematically handling returns from various channels.

fastRestocking.title: Fast Restocking
fastRestocking.description: For returned products that meet standards, we provide rapid inventory reprocessing and re-shelving, making them immediately available for secondary sales.

stockManagement.title: Overstock Inventory Management & Disposal
stockManagement.description: We provide flexible overstock inventory management solutions, including discount sales, channel clearance, or environmentally responsible disposal.

reprocessing.title: Product Reprocessing
reprocessing.description: We can perform necessary reprocessing on returned products according to your requirements to optimize inventory and make them resale-ready.

value.title: Choose Us, and You Will Immediately Gain

about.title: About Us - Kenable | 20 Years of Professional Cross-Border Logistics Experience
about.description: Founded in 2004, Kenable Group Corp has focused on cross-border logistics for 20 years, serving 500+ enterprise customers. With a professional team of 200+ people, 4 major distribution centers, and 98% customer satisfaction rate. Learn about our development history and core values.
